dialogues:
Bengazi bengazi
pif puf
posvetne paradigme.

Poldi na verandi
pozabu je paracetamol.
Ojdip v avtopralnici...
AAAAAAH.
N...Nani?
We are mind.
We are matter.

We are matter
molding into minds.

We are mind that
rules over matter.

The Grand Wizards
of the Psalm.

We hold the key
to the gates of light...

And we are the
light that beckons at 
the end of the tunnel.

So which one
will it be,
traveller?

I am but
a lowly wanderer.

My dream is to become
a master of the fabled 
sacred Lute of
the Fourth Cataract.

Legend says that
in order to do so...

One must obtain
a blessing from
the Grand Wizards.

So.. this one
seeks to become
our champion.

Before your journey is over,
two eternal juggernaughts
will do battle.

But what stands
at the centre?

Your soul stands
at the centre, offered up
to the ageless ones...

Only to be
torn in twain.
